action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a red shape in the top left, a purple shape in the top center, another red shape in the top right, an orange shape in the middle left, a yellow shape in the center, and a purple shape in the middle right. There is also a red shape in the bottom left.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors (blue, green, gray, cyan) arranged on a white background. The shapes are scattered and do not form a complete figure.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a red shape in the top left, a purple shape in the top center, another red shape in the top right, an orange shape in the middle left, a yellow shape in the center, and a purple shape in the middle right. There is also a red shape in the bottom left.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any blue shapes in your image?

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors (blue, green, gray, cyan) arranged on a white background. The shapes are scattered and do not form a complete figure.
QUESTION: Are there any blue shapes in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any yellow shapes in your image?

ANSWER: No
QUESTION: Are there any yellow shapes in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: No
